title: Pbe downloading rly slow
body: I have 8mb/s internet but it is downloading at 700kb/s. Why is is significantly slower than normal?

replies.body:
It could be that your internet speed is fine, but your network is having a hard time making a stable connection to our download servers. An unstable connection could cause your download speed to be significantly slower than what it usually is. Look over our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for ways you can improve that.

Hit me back up if you have any issues.
